com.google.maps.android.data.geojson

Class GeoJsonLineStringStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.google.maps.android.data.Style
        • com.google.maps.android.data.geojson.GeoJsonLineStringStyle

  • public class GeoJsonLineStringStyle
extends Style
    A class that allows for GeoJsonLineString objects to be styled and for these styles to be translated into a PolylineOptions object. PolylineOptions docs for more details about the options.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.google.maps.android.data.Style

        mMarkerOptions, mPolygonOptions, mPolylineOptions
